scripts.compile: cd ../HyperBEAM && CMAKE_POLICY_VERSION_MINIMUM=3.5 CC=gcc-12 CXX=g++-12 rebar3 compile
scripts.shell: cd ../HyperBEAM && reset && CMAKE_POLICY_VERSION_MINIMUM=3.5 CC=gcc-12 CXX=g++-12 rebar3 shell
scripts.eunit: cd ../HyperBEAM && reset && HB_DEBUG=1 CMAKE_POLICY_VERSION_MINIMUM=3.5 CC=gcc-12 CXX=g++-12 rebar3 eunit
